channel.title: Economic Growth on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Economic Growth on FinanClub

item.title: Czech Central Bank Has Fewer Reasons to Hike, Vice Governor Says
item.description: The Czech central bank is less likely to raise interest rates in the near future, according to Vice Governor Marek Moravec. Moravec said that the bank’s main focus is now on supporting economic growth, which has been hit by the war in Ukraine and rising inflation.

item.title: US Birthrate Dips Slightly in 2022 After Rebound in Prior Year
item.description: The US birth rate declined slightly in 2022 after rebounding in 2021. The total fertility rate in 2022 was 1.69 births per woman, down from 1.77 births per woman in 2021. The decline in births was widespread, with 38 states and the District of Columbia experiencing a drop.
